column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's is just as old as some of the other joints
column2: but their decor manages to be clean
column3: rather than old and busted. Service is quick
column5: keep in mind that deep-dish pizzas take 30-40 minutes to arrive...so don't waste any time choosing! Be sure to get the Malnati Chicago classic with sliced sausage that pretty much covers the entire pizza. You wont regret it!
